name: Inkies
description:
Inkies is an underwater action game featuring design and art by my school-aged cousin who is eagerly learning game development.  A fun collaboration that we started working on in 2022, Inkies is playable but not entirely complete.  We still want to integrate more levels, better enemy patterns, 3 more bosses, and an updated story if time permits!

GAMEPLAY
Use the arrow keys, WASD, or grab and drag your inkie to move. Use space to shoot. Your inkie will shoot automatically when moving. Ink enemies, grab power-ups, beat levels, collect coins to unlock new characters, and make it on time to Seaweed Burger!

CONTROLS
wasd/arrows: MOVE up/down/left/right
space: SHOT
or
grab and drag inkie: MOVE and SHOOT

note: I think grabbing and dragging the player is the best way to move/play.
